Title: The Raincoats (2)
Plot: Jerry and his girlfriend get some time alone with each other at a movie, Schindler's List, they don't see it; however, Newman sees it and them. A delay in the shipment of the raincoats will make the Seinfelds miss their flight to France, George uses this as an opportunity to get his "little" brother back to his father. The Seinfelds manage to avoid meeting the Costanzas in New York City.
Writer: Tom Gammill, Max Pross, Larry David, Jerry Seinfeld
GuestStars: Annie Korzen, Wayne Knight, Jerry Stiller, Estelle Harris, Barney Martin, Liz Sheridan, Sandy Baron, Michael G. Hagerty, Dorien Wilson, Stephen Pearlman, Judge Reinhold, Melanie Smith, LaRita Shelby, Jason Manary
